Reviews.Title: dangerious
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Sent it to me with bad batty I took it to get it checked and the person at the store said it was going to explode so I had to replace it

Reviews.Title: I've had one for 2 years now
Reviews.Author: Robin Nicolette
Reviews.Content: I have had my Droid X2 for about two years now and it is a great phone.I wish it had a front facing camera but otherwise it is a great phone and I have been very satisfied with it.  It takes better pictures then the newer phones out there.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Frank Morgan
Reviews.Content: Great phone works great only works on 3 g but not 4 but its still a very good phone it runs fast enough for me , great pictures
